Text:
May I ask something: has this movie only 1.33 and 2.35 aspect ratio versions ? I've searched a little on IMDB and haven't found any 1.85 ("DVD Details" - http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0119177/dvd). Anyone better informed ?
Thanks.
Thanks for the question mac2007.  I went looking for the answer and stumbled into a copy of this DvD for sell on Ebay for 75 cents.
